thread.title: Stephanie Crane

author: Stephanie Crane
title: Stephanie Crane
text: Very organised company that makes it easy to change your tyres. My fitter Iain was on time and rang me 20 mins before arrival. Would definitely use again - much easier than taking your car and having to wait. I always seem to get charged extra as well at these places - not the same with Tyres on the Drive. My only criticism is that the delivery date on the website was not correct which had also happened to my husband so you need to allow an extra couple of days. They do ring you though sraight away to advise.
